alert.note: Alert for East Baton Rouge; Pointe Coupee; West Baton Rouge; West Feliciana (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 31 at 3:55PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern West Feliciana, central West Baton Rouge, east central Pointe Coupee and northwestern East Baton Rouge Parishes through 430 PM CDT... At 355 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Port Allen, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Baton Rouge, Zachary, Baker and Port Allen. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 145 and 155. Interstate 110 in Louisiana near mile marker 1, and between mile markers 7 and 8. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: East Baton Rouge; Pointe Coupee; West Baton Rouge; West Feliciana
